summary:
This mod will add 4 craftable, temperable weapons as standalone to skyrim.
These weapons include:
- Ice
- Longclaw
- Robert\'s Warhammer
- Arakh
Please note that these are not exact copies of the weapons from the series or books, but are heavily inspired by them.
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
This mod will add 4 craftable, temperable weapons as standalone to skyrim.
These weapons include:
- Ice (1h & 2h)
- Longclaw (1h & 2h)
- Robert\'s Warhammer
- Arakh

Please note that these are not exact copies of the weapons from the series or books, but are heavily inspired by them.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None so far.

History
=======
V1: Initial release
V1a: Added ice - 2h
B1b: Added Longclaw - 2h

Contact
=======
Right here on the Nexus.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the CK.
Thanks to The Nexus.com for the great service they provide.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Blender - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=12248
GIMP - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
The contents of this mod are not to be used by anyone else without my consent.
If anyone does want to use the assets included in this mod i\'d like to redirect him/her to my resource, which includes the used models and textures. 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12087

Related
===============
Looking for a fancy weapon to include in your new mod?
Look no further! Check out my
[img]http://i.imgur.com/w43aI.png[/img]
No permission needed, models and textures included in every download!
author: Urwy
